"ARKS Card

Players each have their own ARKS Card for introducing themselves to other players. You can edit your own ARKS Card from a Visiphone. You can view your current ARKS Card from the main menu.

*The information you enter will be visible to other players, so be careful not to disclose personal or other sensitive information.
